lines.line: Sometimes life can feel lonely, even when surrounded by others.
The world outside seems cold and distant, leaving us feeling abandoned.
We hide away, seeking shelter from our pain.
We observe life passing by, wondering when our moment will come.
Then suddenly, something catches our attention.
A spark of joy enters our life, bringing color to our world.
We find connection with someone who understands us completely.
And in those moments of true companionship, we remember that we're never truly alone.

parsed_script.full_script: Sometimes life can feel lonely, even when surrounded by others.  The world outside seems cold and distant, leaving us feeling abandoned.  We hide away, seeking shelter from our pain.  We observe life passing by, wondering when our moment will come.  Then suddenly, something catches our attention.  A spark of joy enters our life, bringing color to our world.  We find connection with someone who understands us completely.  And in those moments of true companionship, we remember that we're never truly alone.
